message: Hi Bob, Iâ€™m offering you this unique product for $1450000. I believe this reflects its exceptional value. Let me know your thoughts.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, I was thinking of a figure closer to $900000. Would that work for you?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. Considering the unique qualities of this product, I'm willing to meet you closer to your figure. How about $1200000 for the product? I believe this price fairly reflects its value while also offering you an excellent deal. Looking forward to your thoughts.
Alice, thanks for coming down. I appreciate it. However, I was hoping for something closer to $800000. Can we settle at this price?
